==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|あん|こく|じ|だい|yomi=o}}

===Etymology===
Compound of {{m|ja|暗黒||darkness|tr=ankoku}} and {{m|ja|時代||period, era|tr=jidai}}.

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|あんこく じだい}}

# a historical period where social disorder is so great due to war, disease, political disorder etc. that there is little or no cultural development; [[Dark Ages]]

[[hu:暗黒時代]]
[[zh:暗黒時代]]
